Flashcards about SAT8000词汇19 ... unmistakable a.不会弄错的,明显的 tendril n.卷须,蔓,卷须状之物 tenet n.教义,宗旨,原则.

list.abs: ...若是其没有攀附到任何物体,它仍会自行绕一或几圈,直径为1~2cm,称之为笼蔓圈,tendril loop,在笼蔓的末端会形成一个瓶状的捕虫笼, 引路蜜腺在叶片两面都均匀的分布着引路蜜腺.
...远离地表的茎将会产生高位瓶。高位瓶叶柄的卷须比较长，同时会去攀附其他的物体，以便使植株能向上生长。高位瓶的卷须还有一个特性，若是其没有攀附到任何物体，它仍会自行卷一圈，成为卷须环(tendril loop)，之后，才长出瓶子。高位瓶的形态也有很大的转变，其瓶身较低位瓶来的瘦长，也比较小，翼较为不明显。有些品种的高位瓶的颜色将会比其低位瓶来得平澹。由于猪笼草会产生不同形态的瓶子.
There are tendrils everywhere , and insects come out of the soil ., 有卷须无处不在 , 昆虫出来的土壤.

hang on wall , the greenery on post resembles is a stereograph , and this is the adornment gimmick with a kind of stylish expression , can select the plant of tendril sex and flagging sex .挂在墙壁上、柱子上的绿色植物就像是一幅立体画，而且这是一种表现现代风格的装饰手法，可以选择蔓性和下垂性的植物。
tendril climber plant怎么翻译: 卷须攀援植物,卷须攀援植物相关短语:  doucai vase with tendril vine (瓷器名) 斗彩蔓草纹瓶  jointed tendril 带节卷须.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: probably a diminutive of Old French tendron 'young shoot', from Latin tener 'tender'

entry.def: A tendril is something light and thin, for example a piece of hair which hangs loose and is away from the main part.

example.ex: Tendrils of hair strayed to the edge of her pillow.
example.tran: 她的几缕头发散落在枕边。

entry.def: Tendrils are thin stems which grow on some plants so that they can attach themselves to supports such as walls or other plants.

means.word_mean: 1. slender stemlike structure by which some twining plants attach themselves to an object for support

auth_sentence.content: A long tendril of gas and stars.
